c74object.name: assemblespans
c74object.digest: Assembles spans of notes and offsets for a music transcript.
c74object.description: The `assemblespans` object receives individual note and offset timestamps and groups them into spans for each track.

inlet.name: in
inlet.digest: Absolute millisecond timestamp of a single note.
inlet.description: Receives a float representing the absolute millisecond timestamp of a single note.

inlet.name: in
inlet.digest: Absolute millisecond timestamp of an offset.
inlet.description: Receives a float representing the absolute millisecond timestamp of an offset.

inlet.name: in
inlet.description: Receives an integer that sets the current track for incoming notes and offsets.
